import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store'; class EditProfileUser extends Component { render() { return (

) } } export default connect( "username, password, user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_url_image, user_address,", actions )(withRouter(EditProfileUser));
